name: Poitech.GitHub.io
body:
### Welcome to Poi
We are a three men  startup aiming to make games in  anime sub-culture style.
English is not out first language,but we will work our best to support you.

### SamuraiGirls
We have already finished design three main characters for sale in Unity assetstore which are Samurai,Ninja,Rounin. 
Using nodachi,ninjato and katana in corresponding  martial art styles. Which are Jigen Ryu sword art,Ninjitsu,Iaijitsu.
The package is mainly a models and artwork pack.We are aiming to bring some authentic anime artwork to assetstore. 
The first release will be Rounin,other two will be released as we finished their basic animations.
We are also working on animations as a free give away. Also,each character we release,we will add a free enemy character in the pack.
The animations are still not in good shape,we will keep update it to match certain quality.And a full locomotion animation set will be in the update along with other attack movements,special moves,jump,dash,dodge etc.And of course,the updates  are free.

### Support or Contact
If you have any problem or suggestion working with our pack,please don't hesitate to contact us(poisoftware@yahoo.com).
Or you can post it on this github page,we will check it constantly.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
